name: Get Off My Lawn (Edelweiss303)
description:
My teams game for Global Game Jam Edmonton 2019

The theme was: What does home mean to you?

We made a classic beat 'em up style game where you play as an old lady (Grandma Morley) who's goal is to defend her home, which she has spent her whole life in, from construction workers who want to tear it down. 

Built for Windows and macOS.
